meanings.sent1: The old, torn book was unwished by the students.
meanings.sent2: The unwished rain ruined the outdoor picnic.
meanings.sent3: The unwished surprise party left everyone confused.
meanings.sent4: The unwished visitor brought chaos to the peaceful household.
meanings.sent5: The unwished chores piled up, causing frustration.

meanings.definition: Not wished for or hoped for.
meanings.sent1: The unwished outcome of the game disappointed the team.
meanings.sent2: The unwished news of the accident spread quickly.
meanings.sent3: The unwished delay in the flight made everyone anxious.
meanings.sent4: The unwished consequences of the decision were unforeseen.
meanings.sent5: The unwished illness affected the entire family.
